@graph.name: EVD 1: Issue Conversion Rate â€” MATSUlab Discourse Graph
@graph.description: Evidence bundle for the finding that 29% of MATSUlab issues (n=434) were claimed as experiments and 38% of those claimed at least one formal result node, yielding 136 total RES nodes. Contains the evidence statement, static and interactive figures, underlying data, and methodological documentation.

@graph.name: Evidence Bundle Metadata (JSON-LD)
@graph.description: Canonical evidence bundle metadata using the dge: (Discourse Graph Evidence) vocabulary.

@graph.name: Figure 1: Issue Conversion Rate (static)
@graph.description: Two-panel figure. Left: stacked horizontal bar showing 434 issues broken down by claiming type (68 explicitly, 54 inferred, 5 ISS with activity, 307 unclaimed). Right: donut chart of claiming authorship (103 self-claimed, 19 cross-person).

@graph.name: Figure 1: Issue Conversion Rate (interactive)
@graph.description: Interactive HTML/JS version of Figure 1 with hover tooltips, animated transitions, and responsive layout. Self-contained single-file application.

@graph.name: Conversion Rate Data
@graph.description: Aggregated conversion rate data with claiming type breakdown, authorship statistics, and result production metrics.

@graph.name: Evidence Statement and Figure Legend
@graph.description: EVD 1 evidence statement, evidence description, and figure legend in markdown.

@graph.name: Methods Excerpt
@graph.description: Relevant sections from the full methods document covering node identification, claiming detection, and metric definitions.
